title: Mountain Khakis Men's Alpine Utility Short Relaxed Fit
features: Reinforced seat pocket panels with hook & loop closure
6 pockets including utility pocket on right thigh
5 Pockets + Utility Pocket, Patch Back Pockets
description: Our AUS is the new standard for the outdoorsman's rugged canvas short. Whether you're on the river or on belay, you'll appreciate the angled-access back cargo pockets with Velcro tabs. Made with our proprietary 10.4oz cotton canvas, they rarely make it to the closet. Reinforced seat panel, utility pocket on right thigh. Flat front and rear angled patch pockets double as drop pockets. Inseam action gusset. Triple-stitched seams. 6 hand pockets including signature hidden side seam pocket. Relaxed Fit with mid-rise. 3 inseam lengths. Imported. Garment washed.
